create.title: Set Up a Server
create.no_java: No Java detected, mate. Click the button below to scan.
create.java_scan: Scan all disks for Java installations

config.title: Edit Config
config.select_server: Pick a server to edit config
config.no_server: Please pick a server to edit config
config.no_config: No config file found. Start the server once to generate server.properties

players.title: Manage Players
players.server_not_running: Need the server to be running to manage players
players.server_not_running_hint: ⚠ Server's not running, can't send commands

settings.title: Settings
settings.auto_stop_desc: Automatically send stop command to running servers when exiting Sea Lantern to prevent data loss
settings.auto_eula_desc: Automatically write eula=true before starting server – saves you the hassle
settings.server_defaults_desc: Default parameters used when setting up new servers
settings.max_memory_desc: Reckon at least 1024MB. Big modded servers might need 4096MB or more
settings.min_memory_desc: Best to set it to about 1/4 to 1/2 of max memory
settings.default_java_desc: Leave blank to auto-detect the best Java each time
settings.jvm_args_desc: These parameters will be added to all server startups. Good for GC optimisation
settings.port_desc: Minecraft default port is 25565. Multiple servers need different ports
settings.console_font_size_desc: Size of console log text, default 13
settings.max_log_lines_desc: Max number of log lines to keep per server. Older logs get turfed. Default 5000
settings.theme_desc: Pick the theme. "Follow System" matches your device's dark/light mode
settings.font_size_desc: Adjust the size of interface text
settings.font_family_desc: Pick the font for the interface. Some fonts need to be installed first
settings.acrylic_desc: Turn on Windows frosted glass effect – works with background images
settings.acrylic_not_supported: Acrylic effect not supported on your system, sorry
settings.background_desc: Upload an image for the background. Supports PNG, JPG, WEBP, etc.
settings.opacity_desc: Adjust background opacity (0.0 - 1.0). Lower number = more see-through
settings.blur_desc: Add blur to the background to make the foreground clearer
settings.background_size_desc: Choose how the background image is displayed
settings.import_desc: Paste JSON data you exported earlier
settings.reset_desc: Are you sure you want to restore all settings to default values? You can't undo this, mate.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Minecraft Server Management Tool
about.hero_desc:
A Minecraft server launcher built by the community.
Not just open source code, but a soul defined by you.
about.manifesto_text1: Sea Lantern is a glowing block in Minecraft — made from heaps of fragments, yet giving off a soft and steady light.
about.manifesto_text2:
Just like this project, every contributor's a piece of sea lantern.
When we come together, we light up the whole community.
about.contributor_desc: Everyone who's made this project better
about.way_code_desc: Send through PRs, fix bugs or add new features
about.way_promote_desc: Share with more MC server owners
about.footer_text1: Sea Lantern's an open-source project under GPLv3.
about.footer_text2: Minecraft's a registered trademark of Mojang Studios. This project's got nothing to do with Mojang.
about.footer_quote: "We built the skeleton, and the soul's up to you."
